src:
Umaawat sa away, SK kagawad sinaksak ng basag na bote sa QC
03 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Melnie Ragasa-Jimena
Malubhang nasugatan ang isang kagawad ng Sangguniang Kabataan (SK)  makaraang saksakin ng basag na bote habang umaawat umano sa away ng kaniyang mga kapitbahay sa kaniyang nasasakupang barangay sa Project 4, Quezon City, nitong Linggo ng madaling araw.
Ang biktima na si John Crisanto Bejo, 21-anyos, binata, SK Kagawad ng Bgy. Escopa 2 at residente ng Blk 29, Lot 5, Bgy. Escopa 2, Project 4, QC ay patuloy na inoobserbahan sa Quirino Memorial Medical Center (QMMC) dahil sa ‘avulsed wound posterolateral chest’.
Agad namang nadakip ang suspek na  nakilalang si Errol Castor Lim, 51, mananahi, may asawa ng Blk 21, Lot 7, Bgy. Escopa, Proj. 4 ng nasabi ring lungsod.
Batay sa inisyal na imbestigasyon ni PSSgt. Juvy Fallesgon, ng Criminal Investigation and Detection Unit ng Quezon City Police District (CIDU-QCPD) ang insidente ay naganap dakong alas-2:15 ng madaling araw, sa Top Side Road ng naabing barangay.
Ayon sa mga nakasaksi sa insidente, bilang kagawad ng  SK ay inawat umano ng biktima ang suspek at dalawang lalaki na nagkakagirian.
Subalit sa halip na paawat ang suspek ay  ang   kagawad ang pinagtuunan nito ng galit at sinaksak ng bote sa likuran.
Nang duguang bumagsak ang biktima ay agad na isinugod ng kaniyang mga kapitbahay sa Quirino Memorial Medical Center (QMMC) at hanggang ngayon ay inoobserbahan pa dahil sa ‘avulsed wound postero lateral chest’, ayon kay Dr. Gizelle Bea U. Estrella.
Matapos ang pananaksak ay boluntaryo namang sumuko ang suspek sa pulisya at sinabing pinagtulungan siyang bugbugin ng nasaksak na SK kagawad at ng dalawang kasama nito.
text:
Leading to the fight, SK members shot a broken bottle at QC
03 Nov 2019, 10:58 by Melnie Ragasa-Jimena
A member of the Youth Council (SK) was seriously injured after being hit by a broken bottle while allegedly stealing a fight from his neighbors in his village in Project 4, Quezon City, Sunday morning.
The victim, John Crisanto Bejo, 21, was a young man, SK Kagawad of Bgy. Escopa 2 and resident of Blk 29, Lot 5, Bgy. Escopa 2, Project 4, QC is under constant supervision at Quirino Memorial Medical Center (QMMC) due to 'avulsed wound posterolateral chest'.
The suspect was identified as Errol Castor Lim, 51, a tailor, married at Blk 21, Lot 7, Bgy. Escopa, Proj. 4 of the same city.
Based on the initial investigation by PSSgt. Juvy Fallesgon, of the Criminal Investigation and Detection Unit of the Quezon City Police District (CIDU-QCPD) said the incident took place around 2:15 am on the Top Side Road of the said village.
According to eyewitnesses, the victim said the victim and the two men were in custody.
But instead of turning the suspect over, the gang focused on the riot and stabbed him in the back.
When the victim suddenly blew up, his neighbors immediately rushed to Quirino Memorial Medical Center (QMMC) and are still being observed for 'avulsed wound postero lateral chest', according to Dr. Gizelle Bea U. Estrella.
After the stabbing, the suspect voluntarily surrendered to the police and said he was assisted by the stabbing of SK and his two accomplices.
